entries.abort: You better have a good reason for aborting pilot! Initiating emergency hyperspace jump!
entries.angry_disable: You will never get away with this you Rebel scum!
entries.arrival_phase_1: Alright, the Rebels spy ships is transmitting the coordinates of the technicians ship to you now.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Intercept the technicians shuttle and disable it. The spies we have aboard will try to take control of the ship when it's disabled.
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.capture_complete: Worvog Arkon: < The Rebel Commando's have finished repairs on the shuttle. Escort them to safety. >
entries.capture_phase_1: Team Warscythe reporting. Terminating the crew, status report in 10.
entries.capture_phase_2: Crew terminated, package intact. Repairing shuttle.
entries.capture_started: Worvog Arkon: < Contacting the Rebel Commando team on board. >
entries.complete: Good job my friend. The Commando squad leader is effective, he 'convinced' the technician to give us the route of the Imperial freighters.
entries.escort_remaining: Worvog Arkon: < Our spy vessel tells me there's %DI escort ships left. Destroy them all if you can. >
entries.escort_wiped_out: Worvog Arkon: < I'm getting the report that there are no more escort fighters left, good job pilot. >
entries.failed_destroy: The Rebels lost some of their best men there, I think you will have some explaining to do pilot...
entries.failed_escape: The technician slipped away! This is not good, we need to come up with a new plan quickly...
entries.panic_1: TIE ships approaching. Our pilot is skilled but this vessel is not designed for fighter combat so we will need your assistance pilot.
entries.panic_4: TIE Fighters attacking. Lets terminate them quickly and move on.
entries.quest_disable_d: Disable the reactor or engines of the shuttle so that they can't escape once the attack is under way.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the stolen shuttle to safety. We are reading dozens of incoming fighter ships, the Empire is determined not to let you get away. For lack of a better term, may the force be with you.
entries.quest_location_d: The Dantooine system shouldn't be very dangerous for an experienced pilot like you but this shuttle is heavily guarded and who knows what other surprises the Empire has in the area so stay alert.
entries.quest_recover_d: While the commando team is taking control of the shuttle, keep it safe from enemy ships.
entries.recovery_success: Alright, the shuttle is safe from there. Good job pilot, stand by.
entries.split_quest_alert: We have the location of some of the Imperial freighters shipping parts for the space station. They are taking a secretive route through the Endor system, lets make a surprise visit.
entries.target_disabled: Alright, the techicians shuttle is disabled, good work!
entries.taunt_1: We have been sanctioned to terminate you all Rebels.
entries.taunt_3: We will not let you leave here with that man, even if it means he doesn't leave either!
entries.taunt_4: End of the line Rebel fools!
entries.taunt_5: I will destroy you, foolish Rebels!
entries.thanks_2: No more bogeys within scan range.
entries.thanks_5: That was the last of that fighter wing, proceed as planned.
entries.title: Dantooine system: Kidnap Imperial technician.
entries.title_d: We are about to kidnap one of the technicians building the new Imperial space station in the Lok system. The Alliance have managed to place a commando team on board his shuttle. You need to take out the shuttle escort and disable the ship so that they can take control of it.
